componentDescription: Displays important messages to users with various styles and states.

icon.description: Custom icon element to display in the alert, overriding the default variant-based icon.

title.description: The main title or heading of the alert.

views.type: { container?: object, icon?: object, title?: object, description?: object }
views.description: Allows overriding default styles for specific internal elements like the container, icon, title, or description.

description.description: The detailed description or message content of the alert.

variant.description: Determines the visual style and semantic meaning of the alert.

themeMode.description: Overrides the global theme mode for this specific alert component, affecting its appearance.

children.description: Content to be rendered as the alert's description, alternative to the 'description' prop.
